DataElement.preferredName: Notification Administration Reuse Template Study Activity Status Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An administrative activity defined at the global library level that represents the communication of a message to a recipient. EXAMPLE(S): An alert sent to a study PI that the study has reached 75% of target subject accrual. A coded value specifying the phase in the lifecycle of the activity as part of a global library. EXAMPLE(S): Draft New, Released, Retired Archived.
